solution_line_template: Michael has used {rubber_bands_used_for_small_balls} rubber bands because {small_balls_made} x {rubber_bands_per_small_ball} = <<{small_balls_made}*{rubber_bands_per_small_ball}={rubber_bands_used_for_small_balls}>>{rubber_bands_used_for_small_balls}
Michael has {remaining_rubber_bands} rubber bands remaining because {total_pack_size} - {rubber_bands_used_for_small_balls} = {remaining_rubber_bands}

Michael can make {num_large_balls} large balls because {remaining_rubber_bands} / {rubber_bands_per_large_ball} = <<{remaining_rubber_bands}/{rubber_bands_per_large_ball}={num_large_balls}>>{num_large_balls}
